pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, May 15, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Edmonton, Alberta

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister, the Minister of Infrastructure, Amarjeet Sohi, and the Minister of Transport, Marc Garneau, will make an infrastructure announcement.

Edmonton City Hall
1 Sir Winston Churchill Square

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:45 a.m. via main entrance and to register at the Heritage Room (ground floor).

Calgary, Alberta

12:45 p.m. The Prime Minister, the Minister of Infrastructure, Amarjeet Sohi, and the Mayor of Calgary, Naheed Nenshi, will make an infrastructure announcement. A media availability will follow.

Stampede Station
1331 Macleod Trail SE

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 12:15 p.m.
    • Please note media parking for this announcement has been reserved in Calgary Stampede Lot 11, with entrance off 12th Ave before the casino. If you do not have a Calgary Stampede media parking pass, let the attendant know you are there for the federal announcement.
